Name: assign_user_story_to_sprint
Description: 1 if UserStory u is assigned to Sprint s; 0 otherwise.

Name: select_feature_for_release
Description: 1 if Feature f is included in ReleasePlan r; 0 otherwise.

Name: allocate_task_to_worker
Description: 1 if Task t is executed by Worker w; 0 otherwise.

Name: set_task_status_done
Description: 1 if Task t is completed within Sprint s; 0 otherwise.

Name: activate_blocker_resolution
Description: 1 if Blocker b is resolved in Sprint s; 0 otherwise.

Name: choose_sprint_goal_commitment
Description: 1 if SprintGoal for Sprint s is committed; 0 otherwise.

Name: allocate_team_to_project
Description: 1 if Team t is assigned to Project p; 0 otherwise.

Name: prioritize_user_story
Description: Integer priority rank assigned to UserStory u.

Name: estimate_story_points
Description: Integer story points chosen for UserStory u.

Name: set_worker_availability
Description: Availability percentage for Worker w in the sprint.

Name: limit_sprint_wip
Description: Maximum number of concurrent Tasks per Worker in Sprint s.

Name: select_epic_for_decomposition
Description: 1 if Epic e is selected for decomposition this increment; 0 otherwise.

Name: choose_deployment_target
Description: 1 if DevelopmentSnapshot v targets production; 0 otherwise.
